name: *Free* Website Content Gathering Notion Template
description: Why this template?As a Web designer and Webflow developer, I know content gathering can be a painful experience for both service providers and clients.I created this template to be able to make the content gathering more efficient for both parties involved.Iâ€™ve used a tool before for content gathering which I find awesome to use, but I want something cheaper and more customizable.What are the benefits of this template?Workflow - Improved content gathering experience. All done in Notion.Customiza
features: Workflow- Improved content gathering experience. All done in Notion.; Customizability- You are not limited to SaaS interfaces of famous content gathering softwares. You are also not overwhelmed by the many possibilities of a spreadsheet.; Cheaper Alternative- Notion is pretty much free to some extent. No need to pay monthly subscriptions.; Visually minimal- Notion emphasizes on a minimalistic, clean, look and feel so you could focus on the more important parts; Introduction- Read this first before anything else; Requests- All the requests that you send out and share to the client. This database is connected to each client; Client Database- The list of the clients you send out requests to. This database is connected to each request; List of Fields- This is a list of fields that are used in the pages (In each request, there are several pages); Enter price in the "Name a fair price"
